column1: #Text=Well so , how to you maintain continuity and fluidity of the story across the pages ?
#Text=By being very diligent before I write it .
#Text=So if I 've , I am a big believer that you should outline everything .
#Text=So before I write the script I 've got it all planned out , I know which character 's gonna go where ; so that I do n't have to make it up and hope I can remember what 's all going to happen .
#Text=If I have got it all laid out , " okay , Issue #1 this happens .
